title: Labor Day Recipes
description: In the United States, Labor Day is always celebrated on the first Monday in September.Labor Day is the holiday that ends the long hot summer. Too hot to Barbecue, Labor Day calls for a more relaxed pace. Take the kids to the park, theme park, zoo, or entertain friends and family at home. What ever makes your perfect day? You are sure so find some delicious recipes in my Labor Day 2012 collection, or any day. Choose from Picnic Finger foods, Appetizers, Delicious Main Dishes to Desserts and Fruit Punches.
author: June Kessler
